description.value:
School: transmutation;
Level: Druid 3, Ranger 3; Domain: Scalykind 3;
Components: V, S, F, DF
Casting Time: 1 standard action
Range: close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Target: one living creature
Duration: 1 Hours/Level
Power Points/Spell Points Cost: 5
Saving Throw: Will Negates
Spell Resistance: yes

Description

Greater magic fang gives one natural weapon of the subject a +1 per four caster levels (maximum +5) enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls. The spell can affect a slam attack, fist, bite, or other natural weapon. (The spell does not change an unarmed strike’s damage from nonlethal damage to lethal damage.)

Alternatively, you may imbue all of the creature’s natural weapons with a +1 enhancement bonus (regardless of your caster level).

Greater magic fang can be made permanent with a permanency spell.

system.shortDescription:
Greater magic fang gives one natural weapon of the subject a +1 per four caster levels (maximum +5) enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls. The spell can affect a slam attack, fist, bite, or other natural weapon. (The spell does not change an unarmed strike’s damage from nonlethal damage to lethal damage.)

Alternatively, you may imbue all of the creature’s natural weapons with a +1 enhancement bonus (regardless of your caster level).

Greater magic fang can be made permanent with a permanency spell.
system.snip: One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1/four caster levels on attack and damage rolls (max +5).

specialActions.action: Create unique "Magic Fang, Greater" from "D35E.commonbuffs" on target;Set buff "Magic Fang, Greater" field data.level to max(1,(@cl)) on target;Set buff "Magic Fang, Greater" field data.timeline.enabled to true on target;Set buff "Magic Fang, Greater" field data.timeline.formula to (@cl)*600 on target;Activate buff "Magic Fang, Greater" on target
specialActions.name: Magic Fang (one weapon +[[min(5,max(0,floor((@cl)/4)))]])

specialActions.action: Create unique "Magic Fang" from "D35E.commonbuffs" on target;Set buff "Magic Fang" field data.level to max(1,(@cl)) on target;Set buff "Magic Fang" field data.timeline.enabled to true on target;Set buff "Magic Fang" field data.timeline.formula to (@cl)*600 on target;Activate buff "Magic Fang" on target
specialActions.name: Magic Fang (all weapons +1)
